name: Tower and Sword of Succubus
description:
Japanese developer LibraHeart teams up with Critical Bliss to debut for the first time on Steam with an erotic double feature! Play as two demon succubi from different timelines featuring retro graphics, classic action RPG gameplay, and of course... a lot of animated pixel art hentai content!
Critical Bliss will also be updating both of these games with a completely original soundtrack featuring https://soundcloud.com/ardklaw!
Her power is gone!??
A succubus who lost her power must ascend a 77-story tower in order to get her power back! Charm the onslaught of monsters while slaying them to proceed! In the tower are 6 bosses. Defeat the sexy boss characters and reach the top floor of the tower!Charming Magic
Charming Magic is the signature ability of a succubus. Charm your opponents, and in a manner fitting of a succubus, suck away the life force of your enemy!Adventurer Logs
Scattered around the tower are left-behind books. Discover strategy tips and erotic short stories by finding them!
Looks like somehow you got a holy sword?
A succubus wielding a holy sword is on an adventure to defeat the king of demons! Solve puzzles and encounter monsters all while enjoying erotic events as you conquer the dungeons! By obtaining magic and items, you can go places that you had previously been unable to reach! Gain the ability to push heavy objects, to set things on fire... Explore every nook and cranny of the map!Succubus Milk is a Miraculous Cure
You will surely encounter people suffering hardships as you make your journey. When that happens, make sure to bring along some succubus milk!
To save the people, give them milk! By massaging your breasts, you can exude tons of milk!All Sorts of Erotic Event!
Have sex with villagers, be a "lady of the night", fuck monsters and satisfy yourself with hand-drawn erotic pixel art animations! Will you be able to find all the events?
